mapper.select:
select count(*) as total_count from board where
and doc_no = #{schVal}
and title like concat('%', #{schVal}, '%')
and writer like concat('%', #{schVal}, '%')
mapper.insert:
select ifnull(max(doc_no), 0) + 1 as doc_no from board
insert into board (doc_no, title, content, writer) values (#{docNo}, #{title}, #{content}, #{writer})
